name: Ring Central
description: RingCentral empowers businesses with AI-first conversation intelligence, and unlocks rich customer and employee interactions to gain insights and accelerate business outcomes. With decades of expertise in reliable and secure cloud communications, RingCentral has earned the trust of millions of customers and thousands of partners worldwide.
features: Offer service  to Non profit organization
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: The complete cloud communication platform
ShortDescription: RingCentral, Inc. (NYSE: RNG) is a leading global provider of cloud-based business communications
enhanced_description: RingCentral is a leading global provider of AI-first cloud-based business communications, offering a complete platform to empower businesses. It leverages conversation intelligence to unlock rich customer and employee interactions, gaining insights and accelerating business outcomes. With decades of expertise in reliable and secure cloud communications, RingCentral has earned the trust of millions of customers and thousands of partners worldwide.
key_use_cases: Gaining insights from customer and employee interactions
competitive_advantages: Decades of expertise in reliable and secure cloud communications
Global trust and widespread customer/partner adoption
roi_benefits: Increased skill development and learning efficiency
